definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: neigh, cry shrilly (Ar. s.ahalaa neigh, Syr s.hal id.; Targum Es 8:15 = BH);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[חָֽהֲלָה]] Es 8:15; 3 pl. [[חָֽהֲלוּ]] Is 24:14; Impf. 3 mpl. [[יִחְהָָלוּ]] Je 5:8; 2 fs. [[תחהלי]] Je 50:11 Kt, Qr 2 mpl. [[תִּחְהֲלוּ]] and so Vrss; Imv. fs. [[חַהֲלִי]] Is 10:30 +; mpl. [[חַהֲלוּ]] Je 31:7; —
neigh, of men under fig. of stallions; c. [[אֶל]] unto (in desire) Je 5:8, of profligate Judaeans; abs. Je 50:11 of arrogant Chaldeans.
cry shrilly, in distress Is 10:30 (c. adv. acc. [[קוֹלֵךְ]]); usu. joy, praise (‖[[רָנַן]]) Is 12:6, Is 54:1, c. [[ב]] at, over, Je 31:7, Is 24:14; + [[שָׂמֵָחָה]] Es 8:15.
